channel.title: Is it possible to make a rs 2 private server online with out a wirless router?
channel.description: My question is well read the topic 0.o is it possible to do this or is a wirless router essential to this prosses? (Please not I have a wirless router but might as well learn right)

He obviously is lol -.-… and yeah… No router needed ftw.
